QuestData.Title: The Clarity Elixir
QuestData.Description: I see a thousand glimpses of the future, swimming in a chaotic blur.$B$BIt is possible to focus my energies to see the true eventuality - the future most likely to come to pass.$B$BI will need an oracle stone to focus my power, and a special elixir to still my mind.$B$BTo make the elixir, I will need the following ingredients: wing dust from Swamplighters along the river, fresh hearts from a monstrously-sized hydra, and a rare star lily.$B$BMeet me at Moonwillow Peak when this task is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 Swamplighter Dust, 3 Engorged Hearts, and 1 Starflower.
QuestData.RewardText: My trust in you is well placed, young $c.$B$BThis task would have been troublesome for many of my students, and yet you finished it with ease.
